column4: hi, I've upgraded to ubuntu 12.04 TLS, it installed then reboot, but now with grub when I choose a partition it says (error : no such partition), I can't run windows neither, it was running properly before this upgrade, currently I'm on a live CD, please help me
why is my login ubuntu? does anyone see my messages?
open the grub command line and type ls, that should list the partitions it sees
